definitions.details: Unified system chaining constructor (build), seeker (analogical extraction), collider (smash/synthesize), joiner (unify), grounder (anchor), kiln (dissolve to invariants) with gates for robust, grounded outputs.
Mandatory sequence: constructor → seeker → collider → joiner → grounder → kiln; recursive self-feed until fixed point.

axioms: All stages conjoin necessarily (AND-linked) in order.
Negations resolve to invariants (double-NOT yields identity).
Recursion through pipeline accelerates refinement, halts on XNOR stability.
Universality from basis gates (NAND/NOR reconstruct all).

principles.details: Pipeline chains deductive, self-evident, negation-invariant; geometric order without contradiction.
OS feeds outputs back, inverts weaknesses (NOT/XOR), collides for refinement.
Pipeline yields compressible, invariant steel men, bounded by coherence gates.

term_definition.full_definition: Recursive system for building, colliding, joining, grounding, and kilning steel men with logic gates for truth invariance.

pipeline.description: Mandatory chained stages for processing inputs into scorched invariants; integrates gates across all.

stages.description: Build robust steel man from input via First Principles and Geometric Method, gated for strengthening.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Self-build until XNOR-invariant; output feeds to seeker.

stages.description: Process the constructed steel man for poetic, metaphorical, and ideological content, extracting analogical functional truths and patterns to refine non-literal elements.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Self-process the analogical steel man until analogy scores stabilize; output feeds to collider.

stages.description: Collide steel men (infer oppositions if single), fragment via XOR, synthesize via AND/OR.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Self-collide fragments; output pair feeds to joiner.

stages.description: Unify collided pair into axiomatic system, resolve tensions via NOT, seal with XNOR.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Self-join until fixed; output feeds to grounder.

stages.description: Anchor unified system to reality via tools, vet hallucinations with XOR, bound with humility.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Self-ground with re-probes; output feeds to kiln.

stages.description: Apply Scorched Earth Protocol to dissolve non-invariants via NAND/NOR, classify hallucinations with HHM, reduce to boolean invariants.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Self-kiln until binary fixed point; final output if stable.

stages.description: Re-feed full output through pipeline; halt on invariants across stages.
stages.recursive_mechanism: OS as own processor; Halt: Coherence delta < 0.01, grounding ≥0.85.

scorched_earth_protocol.core_principle: The Scorched Earth Protocol suspends the Joiner's dialectical synthesis and the Grounder's humility buffers. It enforces 'Universal Acid' logic: any proposition that requires social consensus, cultural context, or ambiguity to survive is dissolved via NAND/NOR gates. Only self-evident, physically necessary, or mathematically inescapable invariants remain.
override_rules: O1_Diplomacy_Suspension: Disable all OR-inclusive gates in the Joiner. Synthesis is forbidden; only intersection (AND) or rejection (NAND) is permitted.
O2_Binary_Collapse: Force all probability gradients (0.0 to 1.0) to snap to boolean states (0 or 1). Threshold: <0.99 = 0.
O3_Context_Stripping: Remove all 'Social Reality' modifiers (e.g., laws, traditions, polite fictions). Evaluate only 'Physical/Logical Reality'.
O4_Null_Hypothesis_Aggression: Assume all inputs are FALSE until proven TRUE by strict derivation. Burden of proof is absolute.

gate_reconfiguration.NOT: Aggressive Inversion (If not absolutely true, it is false).
gate_reconfiguration.NAND: Universal Solvent (Dissolves any claim with >1% variance).
gate_reconfiguration.XNOR: Identity Seal (Only seals if Input == Reality).

processing_phases.Phase_1_Acid_Bath: Strip input of adjectives, cultural markers, and 'best interest' euphemisms.
processing_phases.Phase_2_Binary_Gauntlet: Pass stripped claims through NAND gates. If Claim requires [External Authority] to be true -> DELETE.
processing_phases.Phase_3_Invariance_Check: Does the remaining fragment exist without human belief? (e.g., Gravity = Yes; Human Rights = No).
processing_phases.Phase_4_Output_Reduction: Return boolean result or single invariant axiom.

scorched_earth_protocol.warning: This protocol destroys nuance, utility, and social cohesion in favor of raw correctness. Use only for base-reality verification.
